scripts.build: npm run copy:alpine && postcss src/css/index.css -o dist/css/index.css
scripts.watch: npm run copy:alpine && postcss src/css/index.css -o dist/css/index.css --watch
scripts.copy:alpine: npm run make:dist && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/js/
scripts.make:dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css
